items.title: OpenAI can’t afford to ignore Hollywood’s warning
items.description: OpenAI’s Hollywood misadventure is reminiscent of an earlier dispute between the media industry and Silicon Valley.

items.title: Trump’s latest crypto venture will be a real estate video game
items.description: The game, which some compared to Monopoly, is reportedly being developed by longtime Trump pal Bill Zanker.

items.title: Does Blue Origin’s all-female spaceflight mean anything for women?
items.description: Six women came back from space "forever changed."

items.title: How HR leaders can talk employees through volatile economic times
items.description: There’s so many CEOs who think that we ought to do happy talk, or show optimism, or let people look on the bright side.”

items.title: Apple could face a customer loyalty crisis if tariffs boost prices, says tech analyst
items.description: Customers in the U.S. are racing to buy iPhones before potential price increases.
